data.text: @erickro38338774 Hola. Sentimos mucho la incidencia con tu equipaje. Por favor envíanos un MD con todos los detalles del caso. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.

@nataliaperiod Hola Natalia, we are sorry to read about what you tell us. We understand that our colleagues at counters should be able to assist you with your flight in case of any inconvenience as well as provide you with the necessary information. We remain attentive to your messages, regards
@RosieWelsh14 Hola Rosie, we have reviewed your messages and we have responded by DM with indications for the follow-up of your case, we remain at your disposal. Regards

@banessam_ Hola Vanessa, we would like you to give us the details of your query to know how to assist you, you can give us a description by DM to carefully review your comments. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@nomes4 Hola Naomi. We have replied to your DM's. Please read our comments. Regards.
@LADV56797964 Hola, could you send us more information, your booking code and full name by DM, please? Kind regards.
@rishicomms Hola Rishi, could you please send us more details and your case number by DM? Kind regards.
@garyholt_ld Hola Gary, we have replied to your DM. Regards.
@HolidaysHannah Hola Hannah, please send us your booking code and full name by DM. Kind regards.
@lieifi18 Hola, we have replied to your DM. Kind regards.

@Dianaoalgo Hola Mafa, we are sorry to read this, we have requested previously to all details about your case, could you please tell us by DM all details including your PIR code and full passenger name? thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@Dund112 Hola, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details including your booking code, ticket number and registered email? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@katiebute Hola Katie, we are sorry to read this, could you tell us all details by DM in order to help you? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@Raymond14400572 Hola Raymond, we have asked you for details via direct message. We will continue the conversation through that channel. Kind regards.

@Dianaoalgo Hola, we are sorry to read about this inconvenience, we would like to know if your last flight has been operated by us as well as if you have managed to open a claim at the airport, we wait for your response by MD, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @RevaDeVito Hola Reva, sorry for the inconvenience. In order to file a reimbursement claim, please use the following form https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG . Kind regards

@verushka1980 Hola, entendemos en ese expediente se indicó resolución el día 8/11/2022 entendemos estarías inconforme con la respuesta. Podrías apelar a la resolución sí lo deseas, ¿has procedido así? Saludos

urls.title: Reclamaciones sobre el servicio - Iberia

data.text: @verushka1980 Hola, entendemos que abriste la reclamación a través del formulario web https://t.co/waZL0xzxKK; si es así, envíanos por MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) el número de caso que tienes asignado (E********-********) para poder verificar. Saludos.

data.text: @il12355 Hola Ivy, sorry for the inconvenience. If we operated your parent's last flight and they opened a PIR with our colleagues at the airport, please ask them to contact us directly here on Twitter or on https://t.co/mY4B1tCPtd , as we can only share info with the actual passengers

urls.title: Special baggage - Iberia
urls.description: Special baggage means baggage items with specific characteristics that are allowed to be carried on board the plane: skiing equipment, bicycles, musical instruments...

data.text: @turtlemarta Hola Marta, on long haul flights, the surfboard is included on your original luggage allowance, meaning that if your fare includes two checked bags, you can bring one surfboard and also one checked bag. More details at https://t.co/FZ3dvzOiuN . Kind regards
@eeeeebcux Thanks, we've just replied it
@legallois Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@eeeeebcux Please send us a screenshot of that email by DM, we are waiting for a reply from the area in charge. Regards.
@eeeeebcux Hola cocolatina, your case is in progress, we will contact you as soon as possible. Regards.
@legallois Hola and Welcome! Please send us your booking details and we will check your allowance as it depends on your destination. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@parlezvu Hola, could you send us the details of your request, your booking code, last name, e-ticket number, and email address to check the available options? Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@GUSDIAZMAG Hola Gustavo, we have replied your DM requesting for all details, we'll continue through that channel. Kind regards

@luisromerosa Hola Luis, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us more details by DM including your phone contact number with international prefix and which country you are? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@LiElladaugh Hola, ahora respondemos el md que nos enviaste, saludos
@Andrew55888569 We are sorry to read this Andrew, as we mentioned before, we only follow the regulations of the authorities of each country. Regrds

@Andrew55888569 Hola Andrew, sorry to read this. It's the passenger's responsibility to be aware of which documents are needed. Please consult the Spanish embassy or consulate for further information. Kind regards
@herreramlourdes Hola Lourdes. Hemos respondido a tus MD's. Por favor lee nuestros comentarios acerca de tu consulta. Quedamos a disposición. Saludos.
@agromeat Hola, you already picked the seats for the first leg, you must choose the next ones 24 hours before the next flight, you can check the details at: https://t.co/0Kf2bPYeHt. Regards.

@herreramlourdes Hola Lourdes, we replied to your DM and we will contact you as soon as we have any updates. We appreciate your patience. 
Regards.
@Delfisanta Hola Delfi, hemos pedidio priorización al área responsable, te vamos informando ante cualquier novedad. Saludos
@Delfisanta Hola Delfi, sentimos la demora, cuando el área responsable revise te informamos. Saludos
@hrtakcz Hola, could you send us the details by DM, we will gladly help you from there. Regards. https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@DamoFaulkner Hola Damian, if you didn't receive your bags please issue a claim at the baggage counters so that a PIR locator code can be issued. Apologies for the inconveniences.
@DamoFaulkner Hola Damian, we're very sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with the details of your booking so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@Biradelima Hola Bira, animals are not permitted in the cabin on flights to London, or in the hold on flights to/from London. Please send us the details of your booking via DM so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regard. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@AkiraIguchi Hola Akira, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.
@male_comedian Hola Nick, were you able to issue a claim at the airport? Please send us a DM with the details so we can assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@herreramlourdes Vale Lourdes, procedemos a revisar tus mensajes directos. Saludos.
@A_man_ondrums Hola Aman, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.
@jez76uk Hola Jez, we've sent you a DM requesting information, please check our message. Kind regards.

@herreramlourdes Vale Lourdes, quedamos pendientes. Saludos. 
https://t.co/HyIAB652lE

@herreramlourdes Hola Lourdes, nos gustaría tener más información sobre el incidente. ¿Nos confirmas si iniciaste una reclamación en el aeropuerto?, ¿tienes un código PIR asociado?. Déjanos saber todos los detalles por DM para revisar e indicarte cómo proceder. Saludos https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@jez76uk Hola Jez. Have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@AmandaJNolen Hola Amanda, In this case you have to call the company where you purchased the tickets. If you did it with us please send us a DM with the details. Thank you.
@Carlos_Osorio_O Hola Carlos, please call the +34 91 333 67 01, or you can give us the details about your query by DM and we can gladly help you. Regards. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@MorilloIsolda Hola Isolda. Si te encuentras en el aeropuerto, por favor consulta con nuestros compañeros en mostradores para que te indiquen como proceder o bien, realizar el reporte de irregularidad (PIR) del equipaje allí mismo. Un saludo.

@GKatanton Hola GKatanton. . We suggest you to sign up at Iberia Conecta, https://t.co/H2tdxpiZ8M  this way you will be informed of all the news and if your flight is affected, you'd be able to see your status,  possible alternatives and options at your disposal. Kind regards,
@aNickWalker have you tried to communicate with our colleagues? If you wish you can indicate the details of your reservation by DM, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa /2
@aNickWalker Hola Nick, in this case we understand that you should be able to manage it without inconvenience within 24 hours after purchasing your reservation. /1

@A_man_ondrums Hola Aman, we would like you to indicate by DM if you have received compensation for the corresponding contents of your suitcase. We see that the area in charge has sent you the payment and confirmation by e-mail. We look forward to your message, regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@A_man_ondrums Hola Aman, this would be the PIR number mentioned above, what we would like you to indicate is if you have a file number similar to the one previously accredited generated from a claim on our website. Would you confirm this? regards

@martinezfloresm Hola, we are sorry to read about the inconvenience you have had, we understand that in this case you should be able to receive the corresponding indications through your email. We remain attentive to the news of your case by this means and to your comments, regards.

@A_man_ondrums Hola Aman, it is not possible to display the second accredited message. We can only review the image of the PIR, could you write us the number of your file? example: E20221234-21345678, we wait for your answer by DM, regards.
@A_man_ondrums Hola, we thank you for this information. In the same way we understand that you carried out a claim, do you have the file number? We look forward to your response, regards.

@hyuckle_01 We are sorry that you had this inconvenience. We understand that our colleagues have been able to give you instructions in this regard, for our part we remain attentive to any news by this means, regards.

@hyuckle_01 Hola, we are sorry to read about your experience, we would like to know if you have been able to approach our colleagues on the airport to receive assistance or additional information about your incident. We remain attentive to your comments, Regards.
@itskaymari Hello. We are deeply sorry that you have had this issue again. We have reviewed your comments by DM and we have requested some data by that channel, we wait for your response, regards.
@TBenneworth Hola,  we apologize for the delay in responding to your query, we have requested some information by DM to check the status of your case. We remain attentive by that means, regards.
@schn76063101 Hola, we are sorry for the delay in responding. We have reviewed your comments privately and respond by that same means. We remain at your disposal for any other questions, regards.
@RealNathanPink Hola, We're sorry you have this impression of us. Either way on our part we remain attentive to your comments and to your disposal for any new questions, best regards.

data.text: @A_man_ondrums Hola Aman, we don't know the details of your case. You can give us the number of your file privately so that we can review this information and know if we could indicate something different from what you mention, we wait for your response. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@marioperaza Hola Mario, we have answered your direct messages. Let us know by that means in case of any doubt. Kind regards.

@schn76063101 Hola, we are sorry for the inconvenience this incident is causing. Can you confirm if you have tried to approach our colleagues at the airport to receive assistance or additional information? Please let us know all the details of your case by DM. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@FrancoLicciard1 Hola Fran, desconocemos los detalles de tu caso, ¿podrías enviarnos más información por mensaje privado, por favor? Saludos.
@MattKea86877250 Matt, we have responded to your direct messages. Let us know by that means in case of any doubt. Regards.

@MattKea86877250 Hola Matt. We are sorry to read about this. Please consult with our colleagues at the airport desks about this so they can provide you an irregularity part (PIR) code. This way you can follow up via SMS / Email about your luggage incidence. Kind regards,
@Rebuthie Hola Rebecca. We are very sorry for what you tell us. Please send us a DM with all the details of your case. Kind regards.

@josephmcmillen Hola Joe. We are sorry to read what you have shared with us. Everyone at Iberia knows the importance of providing the best service. We are sorry if this time our service has not lived up to your expectations. Regards
@loft_ette Hola Abbie. Could you send us your booking code and the details by DM? Thank you.
@chrismclachlan7 Hola Chris. You must wait for our colleagues to review the case again and send you information via email. Regards
@chrismclachlan7 Hola Chris, please read the last DM we sent you, we indicated you how to proceed with your claim. Kind regards.

@daiatus Hola, nos gustaría tener más información sobre el incidente. ¿Iniciaste una reclamación en el aeropuerto?, ¿tienes un código PIR asociado?. Déjanos saber todos los detalles por DM para revisar e indicarte cómo proceder. Quedamos pendientes.  https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@RosarioDelguil1 Hola Rosario, hemos respondido tus mensajes directos. Déjanos saber por ese medio en caso de cualquier duda. Saludos.

@juanlebodance Juan, para poder revisar y ayudarte desde este departamento, por favor envíanos un MD con más detalles sobre la gestión que deseas realizar. Quedamos pendientes. https://t.co/HyIAB652lE

@Soon2seok Hola Axelle, sorry for the inconvenience. Please check our new DM. We can see you replied to our colleagues' emails back on october, but you never sent a copy of your passport, among other documents that are needed to process your claim. Kind regards
@eeeeebcux Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, we're still waiting for an update from the relevant department. We'll get back to you as soon as we have any news. Apologies
@chrismclachlan7 Hola Chris, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you send us a DM with your email address and the claim reference number? https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@teresa_palomero Hola Teresa, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our apologies. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Soon2seok Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name, email address and the claim reference number https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@juanlebodance Hola Juan, gracias por contactarnos. Por favor envíanos un MD con todos los detalles de la gestión que intentas realizar a través de nuestro call center. Revisaremos y te ayudaremos desde este departamento. Quedamos pendientes. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

urls.title: ¿Por qué los depósitos de combustible van en las alas?
urls.description: ¿Sabías que los aviones llevan sus depósitos de combustible en las alas? ¿Sabes por qué, cuántos hay y cómo funcionan?

data.text: This avoids the use of heavy materials in the wing root, the point where the wings meet the fuselage. 💡 Another ingenious solution to make planes as efficient as possible. Find out more here 👉https://t.co/G6PfoNz7yV https://t.co/62jx1jq4Nm
The weight of the fuel also counteracts the upward force of the lift. Do you know why the plane needs this force? ✈️ (2/3)
Did you know that planes store their fuel in the wings? ⛽️ There are several reasons for loading it there: (1/3)

@meloffbird Hola, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us more details of your case by DM including your booking information, code, ticket number and registered email? Thanks in advnace https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
